channel.title: [Definitely serious class suggestion nu-uh nothing werid about this] The Icibalus
channel.description: > # The Icibalus > **Neutral Icibalus** > > **I'm definitely the best FoL player evah (Passive)** - You must use Citizens every night. > > **Discord Mafia!?!? (Day)** - Occupy everyone today and tonight, close the game and consume the lives of everyon in the game. (Infinite uses) > > **Citizens (Night)** - Cause all killing abilities to target you (Infinte uses) > *Live until the end of game*
